mean_cn: n. 纸巾，餐巾，（小孩用的）尿布
mean_en: a small piece of cloth or paper used during a meal to clean your lips and fingers and to protect your clothes
word_etyma: nap桌布 + kin表名词，小 → napkin餐巾
sentence: You have something on your face. Here, take this napkin and wipe it off.
sentence_trans: 哎呀，你脸上沾了东西。来来来，快拿纸巾擦擦。
